scripts.gi: git add -A && git commit -am ':octocat: :space_invader:' && git push
scripts.sketch-build: npm run ts-build && rm -rf src/sketches && mkdir -p src/sketches && mv sketches/sketch1/sketch.js src/sketches/sketch.js
scripts.ts-dev: tsc sketches/sketch1/sketch.ts --allowUmdGlobalAccess true --esModuleInterop true --isolatedModules true --moduleResolution 'node' --target ES6 --w
scripts.ts-build: tsc sketches/sketch1/sketch.ts --allowUmdGlobalAccess true --esModuleInterop true --isolatedModules true --moduleResolution 'node' --target ES6
